metadata.title: CVE-2021-47380 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:HID: amd_sfh: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferencedevm_add_action_or_reset() can suddenly invoke amd_mp2_pci_remove() atregistration that will cause NULL pointer dereference sincecorresponding data is not initialized yet. The patch movesinitialization of data before devm_add_action_or_reset().Found by Linux Driver Verification project (linuxtesting.org).[jkosina@suse.cz: rebase]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
